faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about IvyEvents

q1.question: How do I create an invitation?
q1.answer: Creating an invitation is simple! Just sign up for free, choose a template from our gallery, customize it with your event details and photos, then share it via email, text, or social media. The entire process takes less than 10 minutes.

q2.question: Can I customize the invitation templates?
q2.answer: Absolutely! All templates are fully customizable. You can change colors, fonts, images, text, and layout.

q3.question: How does RSVP tracking work?
q3.answer: Guests RSVP with one click. You'll see responses in real-time and can send reminders to guests who haven't replied.

q4.question: Is IvyEvents free to use?
q4.answer: Yes! We offer a free plan for small events. Pro and Premium plans unlock advanced features for larger events.

q5.question: Can I use IvyEvents for professional event planning?
q5.answer: Definitely. You can manage multiple events, use premium templates, and keep everything organized for clients.

q6.question: Are the invitations mobile-friendly?
q6.answer: Yes! All invitations are responsive and work beautifully on desktop, tablet, and mobile.

q7.question: What if I need help or have questions?
q7.answer: We offer a help center and email support. Pro and Premium users get priority support with faster response times.
